title: Microsoft 365 app: New sensitivity bar in Microsoft 365 apps on Windows for viewing and applying sensitivity labels powered by Microsoft Purview
description:
,Sensitivity bar provides a more prominent and contextual user experience for viewing and applying sensitivity labels in Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and Outlook on Windows. Â Preview dates may defer between apps. GA date consistent for all apps.
More info: https://insider.office.com/en-us/blog/sensitivity-bar-in-office-for-windows
